name: David McElhinney
description:
David is a Northern Irish travel, culture and sports writer living in Tokyo. When he’s not bashing his head against a keyboard, 
he likes to travel, eat good food, drink good drink, play rugby, and butcher the Japanese language. David’s writing is at www.davidmcelhinney.com and more of his articles can be found on www.tokyoweekender.com/author/david-mcelhinney/ and www.metropolisjapan.com/author/davidmcelhinney/.
